title: Modern Montclare 2bd/1bth with Gas + Heat Included
posting_body: ['Located at 3025 N Harlem in the Montclare neighborhood, this building is steps away from Belmont Avenue resultants and store fronts.', 'Gross Income Limits', '1 Person $58,350', '2 Persons $66,700', '3 Persons $75,050', '4 Persons $83,350', '5 Persons$90,050', '6 Persons $96,700', 'Public transportation includes the 90 - Harlem Blue Line bus route.', 'Apartment Features:', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops', '- Big Living room and bedroom', '- Heat and cooking gas are included!', '- Updated bathroom with tub', '- Laundry in the building', '- Small building', '- Parking available for $25/month', '- Cats and dogs permitted (breed and weight restrictions apply, please inquire with an agent) -', 'FEES apply', 'Contact leasing agent below.', 'Thanks!', 'Funsho Macaulay II\u2028 224-503-5193\u2028<URL>', 'Kass Management Services Inc.', '2000 N. Racine Suite 4400, Chicago, IL 60614']
